Tartarus

Industry Gurus

04 Mar 2019

As part of a marketing thingy at work, our whole team got asked for some examples of people we look up to in the indsutry/regard as 'gurus' in their chosen field. I think a lot of the ones on my list were somewhat obvious and unoriginal choices, but here they are regardless:

  • Brendan Eich
  • Yan Zhu
  • Linus Torvalds
  • Jen Simmons
  • Troy Hunt
  • Addy Osmani
  • Vitalik Buterin
  • Brian Kernighan
  • Dennis Ritchie

Did I miss anyone obvious?
